nodes.text: Star Wars: A New Hope Manga
Star Wars: A New Hope Manga is a manga version of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. It is written by Hisao Tamaki, published by Titan Comics, and is released on August 17, 2018 in the United Kingdom.
The title was previously published as Star Wars Manga: A New Hope.

'A graphic novel presentation of the adventures of Luke Skywalker, Han Solo, Princess Leia, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Chewbacca.'When Luke Skywalker meets the mysterious Jedi Obi-wan Kenobi, he is taken on a journey across the galaxy. Join him in this classic sci-fi adventure filled with droids, a princess and the evil Galactic Empire, uniquely illustrated in fantastic manga style.
